trans-unit.resname: ATQ·3 | Artifact Ward | Card Name
ATQ·3 | Artifact Ward | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature cannot be blocked by artifact creatures, and any damage taken from an artifact source is reduced to 0. Target creature is unaffected by any artifact effects that target it.
trans-unit.target: Target creature cannot be blocked by artifact creatures, and any damage taken from an artifact source is reduced to 0. Target creature is unaffected by any artifact effects that target it.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·4 | Circle of Protection: Artifacts | Card Name
ATQ·4 | Circle of Protection: Artifacts | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Prevents all damage against you from any one artifact source. If a source does damage to you more than once in a turn, you must pay o2 each time you want to prevent the damage.
trans-unit.target: o2: Prevents all damage against you from any one artifact source. If a source does damage to you more than once in a turn, you must pay o2 each time you want to prevent the damage.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·5 | Damping Field | Card Name
ATQ·5 | Damping Field | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Players may not untap more than one artifact during each of their own untap phases.
trans-unit.target: Players may not untap more than one artifact during each of their own untap phases.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·6 | Martyrs of Korlis | Card Name
ATQ·6 | Martyrs of Korlis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Unless CARDNAME is tapped, any damage done to you by artifacts is instead applied to CARDNAME. You may not take this damage yourself, though you may prevent it if possible. No more than one Bodyguard of your choice can take damage for you in this manner each turn.
trans-unit.target: Unless CARDNAME is tapped, any damage done to you by artifacts is instead applied to CARDNAME. You may not take this damage yourself, though you may prevent it if possible. No more than one Bodyguard of your choice can take damage for you in this manner each turn.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·7 | Reverse Polarity | Card Name
ATQ·7 | Reverse Polarity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All damage done to you so far this turn by artifacts is retroactively added to your life total instead of subtracted. Further damage this turn is treated normally.
trans-unit.target: All damage done to you so far this turn by artifacts is retroactively added to your life total instead of subtracted. Further damage this turn is treated normally.

ATQ·8 | Drafna's Restoration | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Take any number of artifacts of your choice from target player's graveyard and place them on top of that player's library, in any order.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·9 | Energy Flux | Card Name
ATQ·9 | Energy Flux | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: All artifacts in play now require an upkeep cost of o2 in addition to any other upkeep costs they may have. If the upkeep cost for an artifact is not paid, the artifact must be discarded.

ATQ·10 | Hurkyl's Recall | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: The activation cost of target artifact is reduced by o2. If this would reduce target artifact's activation cost below o1, target artifact's activation cost becomes o1. CARDNAME has no effect on artifacts that have no activation cost or whose activation cost is o0.

ATQ·13 | Sage of Lat-Nam | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to draw a card from your library. Each time you use this ability, you must choose one of your artifacts in play and place it in the graveyard. trans-unit.resname: ATQ·14 | Transmute Artifact | Card Name
ATQ·14 | Transmute Artifact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search through your library for one artifact and immediately place it into play; also, choose any artifact in play that you control and place it in its owner's graveyard. If the new artifact has a casting cost greater than that of the discarded one, you must pay the difference or CARDNAME fails and both artifacts are discarded. Shuffle your library after playing this card.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·65 | Staff of Zegon | Card Name
ATQ·65 | Staff of Zegon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o3: Target creature loses -2/-0 until end of turn. Creatures with power less than 1 deal no damage.
trans-unit.target: o3: Target creature loses -2/-0 until end of turn. Creatures with power less than 1 deal no damage.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·66 | Su-Chi | Card Name
ATQ·66 | Su-Chi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME goes to the graveyard, its controller gains 4 colorless mana.
trans-unit.target: If CARDNAME goes to the graveyard, its controller gains 4 colorless mana.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·67 | Tablet of Epityr | Card Name
ATQ·67 | Tablet of Epityr | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o1: You gain 1 life every time one of your artifacts goes to the graveyard. Can only give 1 life each time an artifact reaches the graveyard.
trans-unit.target: o1: You gain 1 life every time one of your artifacts goes to the graveyard. Can only give 1 life each time an artifact reaches the graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·68 | Tawnos's Coffin | Card Name
ATQ·68 | Tawnos's Coffin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o3: Select a creature in play; that creature is considered out of play as long as Coffin remains tapped. Hence the creature cannot be the target of spells and cannot receive damage, use special powers, attack, or defend. All counters and enchantments on the creature remain but are also out of play. If Coffin is untapped or removed, creature returns to play tapped. You may choose not to untap Coffin during the untap phase.
trans-unit.target: o3: Select a creature in play; that creature is considered out of play as long as Coffin remains tapped. Hence the creature cannot be the target of spells and cannot receive damage, use special powers, attack, or defend. All counters and enchantments on the creature remain but are also out of play. If Coffin is untapped or removed, creature returns to play tapped. You may choose not to untap Coffin during the untap phase.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·69 | Tawnos's Wand | Card Name
ATQ·69 | Tawnos's Wand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Make a creature of power no greater than 2 unblockable by all creatures except artifact creatures until end of turn. Other cards may be used to increase target creature's power beyond 2 after defense is chosen.
trans-unit.target: o2: Make a creature of power no greater than 2 unblockable by all creatures except artifact creatures until end of turn. Other cards may be used to increase target creature's power beyond 2 after defense is chosen.

trans-unit.target: o2: Target creature gains +1/+1 as long as CARDNAME remains tapped. You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during untap phase.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·71 | Tetravus | Card Name
ATQ·71 | Tetravus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
ATQ·71 | Tetravus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets three +1/+1 counters when cast. During your upkeep, you may move each of these counters on or off CARDNAME. Counters moved off of CARDNAME become independent 1/1 flying artifact creatures. If such a creature dies, the counter is removed from play. Such creatures may not have enchantments cast on them, and they do not share any enchantments on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME gets three +1/+1 counters when cast. During your upkeep, you may move each of these counters on or off CARDNAME. Counters moved off of CARDNAME become independent 1/1 flying artifact creatures. If such a creature dies, the counter is removed from play. Such creatures may not have enchantments cast on them, and they do not share any enchantments on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·72 | The Rack | Card Name
ATQ·72 | The Rack | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If opponent has fewer than three cards in hand during his or her upkeep, the Rack does 1 damage to opponent for each card fewer than three.
trans-unit.target: If opponent has fewer than three cards in hand during his or her upkeep, the Rack does 1 damage to opponent for each card fewer than three.

trans-unit.resname: ATQ·73 | Triskelion | Card Name
ATQ·73 | Triskelion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets three +1/+1 counters when cast. Controller may discard a +1/+1 counter at any time to do 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME gets three +1/+1 counters when cast. Controller may discard a +1/+1 counter at any time to do 1 damage to any target.

trans-unit.target: o3: Draw one card from your library every time an artifact of yours goes to the graveyard. Can only let you draw one card per artifact destruction. May not be used when you destroy an artifact to gain benefits from another card.
